sections.heading: prohibited.No person shall engage in, aid, or abet any person in any conduct, fraudulent activity, or misrepresentation of the facts in violation of sections 48-1501 to 48-1503

sections.text:
48-1504.Conduct prohibited.

No person shall engage in, aid, or abet any person in any conduct, fraudulent activity, or misrepresentation of the facts in violation of sections 48-1501 to 48-1503.

SourceLaws 1984, LB 540, ยง 4.
